attributes.action: Police should use water canons to break up mass illegal gatherings
attributes.additional_details:
Too many people think they can hold illegal gatherings and get away with it, bringing harm
to those trying to enforce the law and destruction to people businesses, and buildings and vehicles.
attributes.background: More constructive power should be given to the police, in order to break up illegal mass gatherings. it’s appalling that people send officers home to their loved ones, wounded.  Those same thugs think it’s ok to harm the 4 legged officers that continue to serve and protect.
